:mod:`waeup.kofa.university` -- academic components
***************************************************

.. module:: waeup.kofa.university

Components that represent academic 'core' stuff like faculties, 

Submodules
==========

The :mod:`waeup.kofa.university` module provides the following submodules:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   certificate.txt
   certificatescontainer.txt
   course.txt
   coursescontainer.txt
   department.txt
   faculty.txt
   facultiescontainer.txt

Additional infos about the referrers of courses and how they are
handled can be found in:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   certcourses.txt
